Fall Home Cleaning

November 1, 2020

With summer gone, it is time to prepare for fall home cleaning! Summer is the busiest season for many and that means lots of dirt, grime, and dust buildup in places you do not normally reach with a weekly or daily cleaning.Here is a list of things to remember to help you get ready for the fall.

Combat COVID with Electrostatic Disinfectant Spray

October 1, 2020

As businesses look for ways to stay open during the pandemic, many have begun using electrostatic disinfectant spray to combat COVID, clean facilities, and ensure the safety of their guests and customers. Here are a few of the industries taking advantage of this breakthrough in cleaning technology.



](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/combat-covid-with-electrostatic-disinfectant-spray)

![Electrostatic Disinfectant Sprays for Gyms](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b80d7ae428af6ee4c77f03/62cc704882fec1f6e61881be_AdobeStock_334216124.jpeg)

Electrostatic Disinfectant Sprays for Gyms

September 1, 2020

Electrostatic disinfectant spray has become a game-changer for gyms and fitness centers. With every company looking for ways to safely allow their customers and members back, gyms have found it particularly tough. So tough that staples in the industry, like Gold’s Gym, are being forced to file for bankruptcy. When patrons are covered in sweat and touching every piece of equipment, what can be done to disinfect the gym environment safely and quickly? Many gyms are turning to electrostatic disinfection as the answer.



](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/electrostatic-disinfectant-sprays-for-gyms)

[read more](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/electrostatic-disinfectant-sprays-for-gyms)

[

![How Airlines Are Using Electrostatic Disinfectant Sprays](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b80d7ae428af6ee4c77f03/62cc73f577f4233460464c56_AdobeStock_363525343.jpeg)

How Airlines Are Using Electrostatic Disinfectant Sprays

August 1, 2020

In a business that moves as quickly as air travel, finding the time to fully clean a plane in between trips is difficult without delaying flights and causing frustration among travelers. But, with the events of today, it became an absolute must.So, airlines found a solution: electrostatic disinfectant spraying.



](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/how-airlines-are-using-electrostatic-disinfectant-sprays)

Entice Home Buyers with a Realty Cleaning

July 15, 2020

Selling a home is hard. You want to make sure you have as many advantages as possible when it comes time to start listing and showing your home. One thing you should absolutely consider is professionally cleaning your home before you show it off to potential home buyers. A professional realty cleaning will give you a leg up right off the bat and provide many benefits to help you on your way to a selling your property.



](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/entice-home-buyers-with-a-realty-cleaning)

How Electrostatic Disinfectant Spray Stacks Up to the Alternatives

July 1, 2020

Electrostatic Disinfectant sprays are the latest advancement in cleaning technology and are quickly becoming a mainstay in the arsenal of cleaners everywhere. They’re efficient, effective, and—compared to the competition—the best way to disinfect a large area.



](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/how-electrostatic-disinfectant-spray-stacks-up-to-the-alternatives)

[read more](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/how-electrostatic-disinfectant-spray-stacks-up-to-the-alternatives)

![Cleaning Tips for Re-Opening Your Office Safely](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b80d7ae428af6ee4c77f03/62cc775e8012a8816162bf79_AdobeStock_412696600.jpeg)

Cleaning Tips for Re-Opening Your Office Safely

June 1, 2020

As many people are coming back to work and to a little bit of normalcy, they are arriving at office spaces that are anything but normal. New protocols, cleaning plans, spacing, and much more are becoming an office norm and the CDC has presented a huge list of things to consider. One of them is how an office goes about its general cleaning practices. Now more than ever you’ll need everyone on your team to do their part to maintain a clean and safe office. Here are a few tips to help you build a strategy and keep your workers healthy.



](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/cleaning-tips-for-re-opening-your-office-safely)

[read more](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/cleaning-tips-for-re-opening-your-office-safely)

[

![The Cleaning Benefits of Electrostatic Disinfectant Spray](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b80d7ae428af6ee4c77f03/62cc77836afaab069488855c_AdobeStock_333030166.jpeg)

The Cleaning Benefits of Electrostatic Disinfectant Spray

May 1, 2020

Fighting every type of bacteria and germ requires constant change and the latest and greatest innovations in cleaning technology. As of now, that means the use of electrostatic disinfectants and cordless, handheld sprayers that unleash its disinfecting prowess wherever needed.With new tech comes new questions. Learning everything about electrostatic disinfectant cleaners and why this new advancement is such an effective tool is the key to maintaining a healthy and productive office environment.



](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/the-cleaning-benefits-of-electrostatic-disinfectant-spray)

[read more](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/the-cleaning-benefits-of-electrostatic-disinfectant-spray)

[

![5 Tips for Cleaning and Sanitizing Your Home or Office Kitchen](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b80d7ae428af6ee4c77f03/62cc77f667626c609ac3fbce_AdobeStock_421500867.jpeg)

5 Tips for Cleaning and Sanitizing Your Home or Office Kitchen

April 1, 2020

A shared kitchen in your home or office is one of the most high-traffic areas. It’s also a natural haven for the spread of bacteria and germs.Whether it’s in your home or your office, keeping your kitchen well-cleaned is crucial for a healthy space. Here are five tips from The Heiser Group for cleaning and sanitizing your home or office kitchen.



](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/5-tips-for-cleaning-and-sanitizing-your-home-or-office-kitchen)

[read more](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/5-tips-for-cleaning-and-sanitizing-your-home-or-office-kitchen)

[

![How to Keep Your Office Clean of Coronavirus](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b80d7ae428af6ee4c77f03/62cc783b96b2b08df17d08f3_AdobeStock_162799650.jpeg)

How to Keep Your Office Clean of Coronavirus

March 9, 2020

Coronavirus is spreading quickly throughout the entire world with new cases popping up daily. Fortunately, the CDC and other health organizations have provided many tips to help offices stay clean of the virus and limit its spread.



](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/how-to-keep-your-office-clean-of-coronavirus)

[read more](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/how-to-keep-your-office-clean-of-coronavirus)

[

![Top 5 Tools You Need to Maintain a Clean Office](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b80d7ae428af6ee4c77f03/62cc7921cb19c9f729dbc81f_AdobeStock_321262289.jpeg)

Top 5 Tools You Need to Maintain a Clean Office

February 1, 2020

When keeping a healthy and clean office, there are a few key items you’ll want in your cleaning arsenal in order to be prepared for any mess in any situation.Having these top 5 tools will go a long way in helping you to maintain a clean office.



](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/top-5-tools-you-need-to-maintain-a-clean-office)

[read more](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/top-5-tools-you-need-to-maintain-a-clean-office)

[

![3 Hardwood Floor Cleaning Tips for Your Home or Office](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b80d7ae428af6ee4c77f03/62cc7ad04939dab7d027c99e_AdobeStock_342820948.jpeg)

3 Hardwood Floor Cleaning Tips for Your Home or Office

January 1, 2020

Cleaning your hardwood floor, whether it be in your home or office, is not something you want to take lightly or do without researching first.A well-maintained hardwood floor can last a long time, so make sure you know exactly what you need to do to take care of it. Here are some simple tips to help you clean.



](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/3-hardwood-floor-cleaning-tips-for-your-home-or-office)

[read more](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/3-hardwood-floor-cleaning-tips-for-your-home-or-office)

[

![The 3 Most Common Carpet Stains in Your Home and How to Fix Them](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b80d7ae428af6ee4c77f03/62cc7b3712b08871a599fb02_AdobeStock_203614128.jpeg)

The 3 Most Common Carpet Stains in Your Home and How to Fix Them

December 1, 2019

Carpet stains at home are a fact of life. The more you try to avoid them, the more often they’ll come. So, it’s best to accept them as a constant and be prepared for the worst.These are the 3 most common carpet stains you’ll come across at home and some ways you can treat each and every one.



](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/the-3-most-common-carpet-stains-in-your-home-and-how-to-fix-them)

[read more](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/the-3-most-common-carpet-stains-in-your-home-and-how-to-fix-them)

[

![3 Tips for Cleaning a Carpeted Office](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b80d7ae428af6ee4c77f03/62cc7bd7f96d396a27325da5_AdobeStock_176109521.jpeg)

3 Tips for Cleaning a Carpeted Office

November 1, 2019

Having a carpeted office has its benefits, such as comfort, but it lacks in the area of cleanliness. Where on tile you instantly notice stains, dust, and crumbs, in a carpet they can go unnoticed for days. And, obviously, removing stains is much tougher.Here are a few tips to help your office maintain a cleaner workplace carpet.



](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/3-tips-for-cleaning-a-carpeted-office)

[read more](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/3-tips-for-cleaning-a-carpeted-office)

[

![How to Fight Mold and Mildew in Your Home or Office](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b80d7ae428af6ee4c77f03/62cc7c6f21f22170fbe92c1e_AdobeStock_246961654.jpeg)

How to Fight Mold and Mildew in Your Home or Office

October 1, 2019

Everyone has encountered mold or mildew, whether it be some fruit left out too long or a cup of water forgotten somewhere in your home or office. Most of the time, the issue can be dealt with by ridding your home of the fungi, but in some cases, the problem has roots that go deeper than rotten food.Mold and mildew can produce extreme hazards for your health, so it’s vital to not only how to spot them from sprouting up, but how to prevent them altogether.



](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/how-to-fight-mold-and-mildew-in-your-home-or-office)

[read more](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/how-to-fight-mold-and-mildew-in-your-home-or-office)

[

![How to Be Environmentally Friendly When Cleaning Your Office](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b80d7ae428af6ee4c77f03/62cc7d76738efe737c0616de_AdobeStock_426285876.jpeg)

How to Be Environmentally Friendly When Cleaning Your Office

September 1, 2019

Consistent office cleaning is a great habit that results in better health and increased productivity but using the wrong products can have the opposite effect. Here are some simple tips to help you and your office to be environmentally friendly when cleaning your office.



](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/how-to-be-environmentally-friendly-when-cleaning-your-office)

[read more](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/how-to-be-environmentally-friendly-when-cleaning-your-office)

[

![5 Tips to Keep a Clean and Healthy Office Environment](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b80d7ae428af6ee4c77f03/62cc7e02b78ab1bf4a9bd65b_AdobeStock_134802255.jpeg)

5 Tips to Keep a Clean and Healthy Office Environment

August 1, 2019

In the workplace, we are all constantly looking for ways to increase productivity and promote a healthy environment for employees, clients, and business partners. As they say: cleanliness is next to godliness.A clean work environment helps you stay organized, work efficiently, and provides a healthy place where you and your coworkers can feel comfortable every day. In fact, a clean workplace can result in a 2-8% increase in productivity. For help with achieving better productivity, The Heiser Group has 5 tips to help you keep a clean and healthy office environment:



](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/5-tips-to-keep-a-clean-and-healthy-office-environment)

[read more](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/5-tips-to-keep-a-clean-and-healthy-office-environment)

[

![How to Pick an Industrial Floor Cleaning Provider](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b80d7ae428af6ee4c77f03/62cc7e69fee77276823a8ca3_AdobeStock_86172418.jpeg)

How to Pick an Industrial Floor Cleaning Provider

July 1, 2019

If you own or help to manage an office space or a factory, you might want to consider outsourcing your floor cleaning to an industrial services provider. An industrial cleaner will be able to wash, rinse, and polish your floors much more quickly and thoroughly than a one-man crew or an intern with a mop.Moreover, qualified and professional industrial cleaners will have the expertise and tools necessary to ensure that they’ll leave your floors as clean as the day your business opened.It’s easy to see why you’d want to hire an industrial floor cleaner, but where can you find a great provider of industrial floor cleaning services? When doing your research for a new commercial cleaning company that can make a good partner, there are two primary qualities to look for.



](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/how-to-pick-an-industrial-floor-cleaning-provider)

[read more](https://www.heisergroup.com/blog/how-to-pick-an-industrial-floor-cleaning-provider)
